In a statement, Mr Marsden said: I understand that the reporter was suspended last year in respect of hacking carried out for that paper last year. Scotland Yard last night confirmed that the News of the World had approached it in September 2010 and handed over information about phone hacking relating to the suspended member of staff. Delivering the party's response to the president is an honor but by no means a ticket to stardom. allegations about phone hacking dating back to his time as editor of the News of the World had made it impossible to devote what he called ''110%'' of his time to his job. When the spokesman needs a spokesman, it is time to move on, he said in his statement. Downing Street insisted his resignation was not precipitated by any new evidence that would challenge Andy Coulson 's claim that he had no knowledge of phone hacking at the newspaper. they came to the conclusion thus far that sharing responsibility for all decisions at Google ''adds delay and so forth in the way we make decisions.'' Things will run much better, Eric Schmidt said, by elevating me and having Larry running things day-to-day. The Internet search leader also said that the company's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will focus on ''special projects.'' Investors rejoiced, sending shares up 2 percent in after hours trading.
